name: Web: The Spider Heros
description:
A  and D to move space is jump left click is web pushing right click shoot web 

after you get the web on the sky plate  the web will break down pass trough the way after the broke down web to complete a level (i didnt have time to add a next level screen so its a respawn screen) puzzle game some times shoot the web to push it even more when it gets stuck.
